name: Spaghetti Bolognese
step: Boil water and cook spaghetti as per package instructions.
In a pan, brown ground beef with onions and garlic.
Add tomato sauce, Italian herbs, and simmer.
Serve the sauce over cooked spaghetti and garnish with parmesan cheese.
ingredients: 8 oz spaghetti, 1 lb ground beef, 1 onion, 2 cloves garlic, 2 cups tomato sauce, 1 tsp Italian herbs, 1/4 cup parmesan cheese

name: Chicken Alfredo
step: Cook fettuccine pasta according to package directions.
Sauté chicken breast in a pan until cooked through.
In a separate pan, melt butter and add cream and Parmesan cheese.
Combine cooked pasta, chicken, and sauce. Serve hot.
ingredients: 8 oz fettuccine pasta, 2 boneless chicken breasts, 1/2 cup butter, 1 cup heavy cream, 1 cup grated Parmesan cheese

name: Margherita Pizza
step: Preheat the oven to 475°F (245°C).
Roll out pizza dough into a thin crust.
Spread tomato sauce, fresh mozzarella, and fresh basil leaves on the dough.
Bake for 12-15 minutes until the crust is golden and cheese is bubbly.
ingredients: Pizza dough, 1/2 cup tomato sauce, 8 oz fresh mozzarella, fresh basil leaves

name: Vegetable Stir-Fry
step: In a wok, heat oil and sauté tofu until browned.
Add a mix of sliced vegetables and stir-fry until tender-crisp.
Combine soy sauce and ginger in a small bowl, then pour over the stir-fry.
Serve over rice.
ingredients: 12 oz tofu, mixed vegetables (bell peppers, broccoli, carrots), 2 tbsp soy sauce, 1 tsp grated ginger, cooked rice

name: Tomato Basil Soup
step: Sauté onions and garlic in a pot until soft.
Add canned tomatoes, broth, and fresh basil. Simmer.
Blend the mixture until smooth, then return it to the pot.
Stir in heavy cream, salt, and pepper. Heat and serve.
ingredients: 1 onion, 2 cloves garlic, 28 oz canned tomatoes, 2 cups chicken or vegetable broth, fresh basil leaves, 1/2 cup heavy cream

name: Caesar Salad
step: In a bowl, mix Romaine lettuce, croutons, and Parmesan cheese.
In a separate bowl, whisk together olive oil, lemon juice, and garlic.
Pour the dressing over the salad and toss to combine.
ingredients: Romaine lettuce, croutons, Parmesan cheese, olive oil, lemon juice, garlic

description: Baked Salmon with Lemon and Dill
name: Lemon Dill Salmon
step: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Season salmon fillets with salt, pepper, and dill. Place on a baking sheet.
Drizzle with lemon juice and bake for 15-20 minutes until flaky.
Serve with lemon wedges.
ingredients: 4 salmon fillets, salt, pepper, fresh dill, lemon juice, lemon wedges

name: Guacamole
step: Mash avocados in a bowl and add diced onion, tomato, and cilantro.
Stir in lime juice, salt, and minced garlic.
Serve with tortilla chips or as a topping for tacos.
ingredients: 3 avocados, 1/2 onion, 1 tomato, fresh cilantro, lime juice, salt, garlic

name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
step: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
In a bowl, cream together butter, sugar, and brown sugar.
Beat in eggs and vanilla. Mix in flour, baking soda, and chocolate chips.
Drop spoonfuls of dough onto a baking sheet and bake for 10-12 minutes.
ingredients: 1 cup butter, 1 cup white sugar, 1 cup brown sugar, 2 eggs, 1 tsp vanilla extract, 3 cups all-purpose flour, 1 tsp baking soda, chocolate chips

name: Fruit Salad
step: Wash and chop a variety of fresh fruits (e.g., strawberries, pineapple, grapes, melon).
Combine in a large bowl and drizzle with honey and lime juice.
Toss gently to mix and serve chilled.
ingredients: Assorted fresh fruits, honey, lime juice

name: Beef Tacos
step: Brown ground beef in a pan, then add taco seasoning and water. Simmer until thickened.
Warm taco shells in the oven.
Assemble tacos with seasoned beef, lettuce, cheese, and your favorite toppings.
ingredients: 1 lb ground beef, taco seasoning, taco shells, lettuce, shredded cheese, toppings (salsa, sour cream, guacamole)

name: Mushroom Risotto
step: Sauté onions and garlic in a pan. Add Arborio rice and cook for a few minutes.
Gradually add chicken or vegetable broth and stir until absorbed.
Stir in sautéed mushrooms, Parmesan cheese, and butter.
Serve hot, garnished with fresh parsley.
ingredients: 1 cup Arborio rice, 4 cups chicken or vegetable broth, 1 cup sliced mushrooms, 1/2 cup grated Parmesan cheese, butter, fresh parsley

name: Roast Chicken
step: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Rub a whole chicken with lemon juice, garlic, and herbs. Season with salt and pepper.
Roast in the oven for 1.5 to 2 hours until cooked through and golden.
Let it rest before carving and serving.
ingredients: 1 whole chicken, lemon juice, garlic, fresh herbs, salt, pepper

name: Vegetable Lasagna
step: Cook lasagna noodles according to package instructions.
Layer noodles with a mix of sautéed vegetables, ricotta cheese, and marinara sauce.
Top with mozzarella cheese and bake in the oven until bubbly and golden.
Let it cool slightly before serving.
ingredients: Lasagna noodles, mixed sautéed vegetables (zucchini, bell peppers, spinach), ricotta cheese, marinara sauce, mozzarella cheese

name: Beef Stew
step: In a large pot, brown cubed beef in oil. Remove and set aside.
Sauté onions, carrots, and celery in the same pot. Add garlic, flour, and tomato paste.
Return the beef to the pot, add broth, potatoes, and herbs. Simmer until meat is tender.
Serve hot with crusty bread.
ingredients: 1 lb beef stew meat, onions, carrots, celery, garlic, flour, tomato paste, beef broth, potatoes, fresh herbs

name: Sushi Rolls
step: Prepare sushi rice and season with rice vinegar and sugar.
Lay a sheet of nori on a bamboo sushi mat, spread rice, and add your choice of fillings (e.g., cucumber, avocado, raw fish).
Roll the sushi tightly, slice, and serve with soy sauce and wasabi.
ingredients: Sushi rice, nori seaweed sheets, rice vinegar, sugar, fillings (cucumber, avocado, fish), soy sauce, wasabi

name: Chicken Noodle Soup
step: In a large pot, simmer chicken with water, onions, carrots, and celery until chicken is cooked.
Remove the chicken, shred, and return to the pot. Add cooked noodles and season with salt and pepper.
Serve hot, garnished with fresh parsley.
ingredients: Chicken, onions, carrots, celery, noodles, salt, pepper, fresh parsley

description: Homemade Spinach and Feta Stuffed Chicken
name: Spinach and Feta Chicken
step: Butterfly chicken breasts and stuff with a mixture of spinach, feta cheese, and garlic.
Secure with toothpicks and bake in the oven until chicken is cooked through.
Serve hot, garnished with fresh herbs.
ingredients: Chicken breasts, spinach, feta cheese, garlic, fresh herbs, toothpicks

name: Mango Salsa
step: Dice fresh mango, red onion, and bell pepper. Chop cilantro.
Combine in a bowl and add lime juice, salt, and a pinch of chili powder.
Refrigerate for at least 30 minutes before serving with tortilla chips or grilled meat.
ingredients: Fresh mango, red onion, bell pepper, cilantro, lime juice, salt, chili powder

name: Beef and Broccoli Stir-Fry
step: Sauté sliced beef in a wok with garlic and ginger until browned. Remove and set aside.
Stir-fry broccoli florets in the same wok, then add a sauce made with soy sauce and cornstarch.
Return the beef to the wok, cook briefly, and serve over rice.
ingredients: Sliced beef, broccoli florets, garlic, ginger, soy sauce, cornstarch, cooked rice

name: Chicken Parmesan
step: Dip chicken breasts in egg and bread crumbs, then fry until golden brown.
Top with marinara sauce and mozzarella cheese, then bake until cheese is bubbly.
Serve over spaghetti.
ingredients: Chicken breasts, eggs, bread crumbs, marinara sauce, mozzarella cheese, spaghetti

name: Minestrone Soup
step: Sauté onions, carrots, and celery in a pot until softened.
Add diced tomatoes, beans, pasta, and vegetable broth. Simmer until pasta is cooked.
Serve hot, garnished with fresh basil and grated Parmesan cheese.
ingredients: Onions, carrots, celery, diced tomatoes, cannellini beans, pasta, vegetable broth, fresh basil, Parmesan cheese

name: Chicken Fajitas
step: Sauté sliced chicken in a pan with bell peppers and onions.
Season with fajita seasoning and lime juice.
Serve in tortillas with salsa, sour cream, and guacamole.
ingredients: Sliced chicken, bell peppers, onions, fajita seasoning, lime juice, tortillas, salsa, sour cream, guacamole

name: Shrimp Scampi
step: Cook linguine pasta according to package instructions.
Sauté shrimp in a pan with butter, garlic, and white wine until pink.
Toss cooked pasta with shrimp and sauce. Garnish with fresh parsley.
ingredients: Linguine pasta, shrimp, butter, garlic, white wine, fresh parsley

name: Tiramisu
step: Mix mascarpone cheese, egg yolks, sugar, and vanilla until smooth.
Dip ladyfingers in coffee and layer them with the cheese mixture.
Chill for several hours, then dust with cocoa powder before serving.
ingredients: Mascarpone cheese, egg yolks, sugar, vanilla extract, ladyfingers, coffee, cocoa powder

name: Beef and Cheese Enchiladas
step: Brown ground beef and mix with grated cheddar cheese.
Fill tortillas with the beef and cheese mixture, roll, and place in a baking dish.
Cover with enchilada sauce and bake until heated through.
ingredients: Ground beef, cheddar cheese, tortillas, enchilada sauce

name: Baked Ziti
step: Boil ziti pasta until al dente. Drain and set aside.
Mix cooked pasta with ricotta cheese, marinara sauce, and mozzarella cheese.
Bake until bubbly and golden. Serve hot.
ingredients: Ziti pasta, ricotta cheese, marinara sauce, mozzarella cheese

name: Caesar Salad
step: In a bowl, mix Romaine lettuce, croutons, and Parmesan cheese.
In a separate bowl, whisk together olive oil, lemon juice, and garlic.
Pour the dressing over the salad and toss to combine.
ingredients: Romaine lettuce, croutons, Parmesan cheese, olive oil, lemon juice, garlic

name: Chicken Pot Pie
step: Cook chicken, carrots, peas, and onions in a creamy sauce.
Pour the mixture into a pie crust, cover with another crust, and bake until golden brown.
Let it cool slightly before serving.
ingredients: Chicken, carrots, peas, onions, pie crust, creamy sauce

name: Banana Bread
step: Mash ripe bananas in a bowl and add sugar, melted butter, and eggs.
Mix in flour, baking soda, and a pinch of salt. Fold in chopped nuts if desired.
Bake in a loaf pan until a toothpick comes out clean.
ingredients: Ripe bananas, sugar, butter, eggs, flour, baking soda, salt, nuts (optional)
